DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effect daily ingestion probiotic Lactobacillus reuteri level secretory IgA cytokine Il1-beta , IL-6 , IL-8 IL-10 saliva healthy young adult .
DOC.brief_title: Salivary IgA Cytokines Response Dietary Supplementation Lactobacillus Reuteri
DOC.detailed_description: Study design : A randomized , double-blind , cross-over design separate three week run-in wash-out period . Each intervention period three week participant allocate test placebo regime randomize order . Material : 41 healthy adult enrol informed consent School Dentistry , University Copenhagen . Methods : Samples rest , unstimulated whole saliva ( UWS ) stimulate whole saliva ( SWS ) collect five time study period . The sample immediately freeze 0.5 ml aliquot . Intervention : The subject instruct ingest two tablet contain Lactobacillus reuteri placebo , twice daily 3 week . No probiotic food health product allow intervention period . All normal oral hygiene routine maintain entire study . The compliance check interview . Any perceived side effect report without delay research staff . Endpoints : The concentration total protein secretory IgA saliva determine enzyme-linked immune-sorbent assay ( ELISA ) . The level cytokine IL1-beta , IL-6 , IL-8 IL-10 determine Luminex-technology . Scientific importance : The study may provide evidence probiotic supplement influence innate defense system whole saliva may open novel strategy combat oral disease .
DOC.criteria: Healthy individual chronic compromising illnesses No medication intake serious chronic diseases No regular intake probiotic product till one month inclusion Recent antibiotic therapy ( within last six month ) Pregnant lactate woman Active infection need treatment antibiotic
